name: Strawberry Lemonade Slushie
description: Strawberry Lemonade Slushie with mint – A refreshing homemade 4 ingredient drink ready in just minutes! Naturally sweetened! All you need is strawberries, lemon, mint, maple syrup, and ice to have this refreshing summer drink!
recipeIngredient: 4  mint leaves or more for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Add the strawberries, lemon juice, maple syrup, mint and ice to blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the strawberries, lemon juice, maple syrup, mint and ice to blender.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a 1/2 cup of water and blend initially in bursts, then longer 15-20 second cycles.  Depending on the blender, you may need to move it around. Add water a few tbsp at a time and keep blending until you get a consistency that you prefer and all the ingredients are blended well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a 1/2 cup of water and blend initially in bursts, then longer 15-20 second cycles.  Depending on the blender, you may need to move it around. Add water a few tbsp at a time and keep blending until you get a consistency that you prefer and all the ingredients are blended well.

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop into serving glasses or bowls. Garnish with mint leaves and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Scoop into serving glasses or bowls. Garnish with mint leaves and serve immediately.

keywords: fresh fruit slushie, lemonade slushie, strawberry slushie recipe
